SQL> 
SQL> CL SCR

SQL> REM TO_CHAR : TO CONVERT NUMBER OR DATE TYPE VALUE INTO CHARACTER TYPE.
SQL> 
SQL> REM TO_CHAR : TO DISPLAY NUMBER OR DATE TYPE VALUE IN USER DEFINED/NON-DEFAULT FORMAT.
SQL> 
SQL> REM TO_CHAR FOR DISPLAYING NUMBER VALUES IN USER DEFINED FORMATS :
SQL> 
SQL> REM TO_CHAR SYNTAX : TO_CHAR('VALUE' , 'FORMAT')
SQL> 
SQL> REM LIST OF VALID FORMAT CHARACTERS : 9 0    . ,    D G    $ L U    S MI PR   EEEE or eeee    V
SQL>
